tool_description: Quick NLP provides useful NLP tools, such as part of speech detection.
name: Quick NLP
title: Quick NLP

api_list.name: Sentence Extraction
api_list.url: https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/sentence/This is my first sentence. This is my second sentence.
api_list.description: Separate sentences in paragraphs into an array of sentences

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: This is my first sentence. This is my second sentence.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/sentence/This is my first sentence. This is my second sentence."

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/sentence/{text}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sentiment Analysis
api_list.description: Analysis / detect the sentiment of a sentence
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment/I'm so happy"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Numeric text to number
api_list.description: Convert numbers written as words to their integer or real format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/num/one thousand two hundred"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Language Detector
api_list.description: Detect the language based on the text
api_list.code:

url = "https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/lang/This is written in English"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Entity Detector
api_list.url: https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/ent/My name is John Smith from the USA
api_list.description: Detect what types of entity each word is, for example, organisation, money, etc.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: My name is John Smith from the USA

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/ent/My name is John Smith from the USA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Part Of Speech Detector
api_list.description: Breakdown a sentence into it's parts of speech
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/pos/This is an example sentence"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
